Row.Text: Stores [ICON_FOOD] Food after a new [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen is born equal to the city's [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reduces enemy spy stealing rate by 25%. Increases [ICON_JFD_BLUE_FIST] Loyalty by 5%.
Our people are now demanding a proletarian government and the elimination of private property. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
Enact the Prodnalog

In order to invigorate our economy, a tax must be enforced upon our most widespread and basic industry: agriculture. With this wealth, the Soviet Union will rise to be the wealthiest nation on the earth, and with this wealth our glorious order can be preserved.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the Soviet Union (Lenin) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Economics [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on Farms

In order to invigorate our economy, a tax must be enforced upon our most widespread and basic industry: agriculture. With this wealth, the Soviet Union will rise to be the wealthiest nation on the earth, and with this wealth our glorious order can be preserved.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on Farms
Establish the People's Commissariat for Internal Affairs

There are many enemies to the state - and some of them lie beyond our borders. A moment of weakness could be their gain, and the undoing of this glorious revolution. We should establish a People's Commissariat for the explicit assurance of our own security - and the implicit guarantee of foreign compliance to our goals.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the Soviet Union (Lenin) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must have a Commissariat in the Capital [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Industrial Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 free Spy [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reduces enemy spy effectiveness in all cities by 33%

There are many enemies to the state - and some of them lie beyond our borders. A moment of weakness could be their gain, and the undoing of this glorious empire. We should establish a People's Commissariat for the explicit assurance of our own security - and the implicit guarantee of foreign compliance to our goals.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 free Spy [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reduces enemy spy effectiveness in all cities by 33%
People's Commissariat for Internal Affairs
Reduces enemy spy effectiveness in all cities by 33%.
Workers on Strike

A worker strike has begun in {1_CityName}. Disgruntled labourers are accusing our government of not taking their interests seriously, and that our pledge to the cause of the working man is mere empty rhetoric. We must put an end to these demonstrations, and show that they cannot be tolerated.[NEWLINE]
We will put them down with force!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_CityName} goes into 1 to 3 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free Gun Unit[ENDCOLOR]
We have resolved to put down the strike in {1_CityName} by force.
Let them strike.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_CityName} goes into 1 turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR]
We have allowed the worker strike in {1_CityName} to run its course.
Joseph Stalin has put a violent end to a worker strike in the Soviet Union.
Worker strikes have begun in {1_CivName}.
Revolutionary Movement

We have been informed by one of the loyal members of our governemnt that one of our high-ranking Ministers is co-operating with an underground revolutionary movement. This kind of disloyalty is of the highest treason and must be put to an end.[NEWLINE]
Have the Minister put on trial.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]30% chance that Rebels will spawn near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital begins celebrating 'We Love the King Day'[ENDCOLOR]
We have put on trial a Minister accused of treason, sparking the underground movement with which he was co-operating to rise up against us.
We have put on trial a Minister accused of treason.
The Minister will be forgiven.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
We have forgiven a Minister accused of treason.
